instructions: Click, 'Activity Log' from the app dashboard. Choose The Date Click on the date to adjust the step count for the day you would like. Click the + to make a new entry. Enter Your Steps Enter in the amount of steps below the words, Steps Taken . When you are done feel free to add an optional note or photo! Make sure to click save when you are done editing your entry. Done! If you go back to your activity log, you will see that your manual entry of steps have been adjusted!
